# ANTSIE <img src="ANTSIE_logo.jpg"" align="right" height="200" />

This repo contains code for the analysis of Southern Ocean mesopelagic distributions as part of the ANTSIE project

For more details of the project see: https://antsie.webspace.durham.ac.uk
